code: import React from'react';class BaseComponent extends React.Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.handleError=this.handleError.bind(this);}handleError(error){if(error.response){const{data,statusText}=error.response;const message=data?typeof data==='string'?data:JSON.stringify(data):statusText;console.error(message);this.props.showErrorToast(message);}else{console.error(error.message);this.props.showErrorToast(error.message);}}}export default BaseComponent;
